net.neto_framework.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.neto_framework.client.Client

  • public class Client
extends Object
    A client handler that can connect to a TCP or UDP server.
    Author:
    BleedObsidian (Jesse Prescott)

      • getRandom

        public short getRandom()
        Returns:
        A random short sent to the server and must be received exactly in the success packet.

      • getTcpSocket

        public Socket getTcpSocket()
        Returns:
        TCP Socket. (Null if not using TCP as protocol or if the client is not connected.)

      • getUdpSocket

        Returns:

        Returns:
        If client is currently connected to a server.

      • getPublicKey

        public PublicKey getPublicKey()
        Returns:
        The public key from the server used by the client to encrypt the shared secret.

      • setPublicKey

        public void setPublicKey(PublicKey publicKey)
        Parameters:
        publicKey - The public key from the server used by the client to encrypt the shared secret.

      • getSecretKey

        public SecretKey getSecretKey()
        Returns:
